about_the_game:
"Why Me" -> Climb -> Die -> Curse developers -> Repeat.

You are stuck on a strange rock in the middle of the ocean, the only way out is to go up.

  • Know your Eye-Hand coordination level.
  • Beware of deadly traps.
  • Play Permanent death mode to set fastest run time.
  • Or just take it easy with checkpoints (no timer).
  • Try to keep a low death count.
  • You know you can do a better run each time you fall or die.
  • Test you patience.
  • Set Global Record

    This is not just another climb game.
    So, be ready to experience progressive difficulty as you move up.


    You play the character of Nolan, who is stuck on a strange rock in the middle of the ocean.

    There is no escape, the ocean is vast and full of dangerous creatures.

    Above you is a way full of hard to navigate objects and deadly traps, perhaps it is a playbox created by some higher dimensional creature who created this to get rid of his boredom and watch you try.

    The strange thing is Death is just a count here, no matter how you die, you spawn back at the bottom of rock.

    Please use the discord link to directly connect with the developer and drop your feedback about game, any bug report or suggestions.

name: Why Me

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and Windows operating system
  • Processor: Intel i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and Windows operating system
  • Processor: Intel i9
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card

short_description: 3D 3rd Person Perma-Death Climbing/Running/Swimming Game with progressive difficulty. Some Traps are unfairly tedious. Set a Record Time or Record Death Count. The Question is "Can you beat the game ?"
supported_languages: English, French, Czech, Dutch, Finnish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean
